abstract: A prediction that Sony might beat Microsoft in game console sales doesn’t quite pan out. The Nintendo Wii stays on top, of course.
snippet: A prediction that Sony might beat Microsoft in game console sales doesn’t quite pan out. The Nintendo Wii stays on top, of course.
lead_paragraph: This just in from video-game reporting headquarters: Sony may be a consumer electronics giant, but its public relations folks aren’t so powerful when it comes to prognostication.
